verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>
Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> put forth<WH2330> a riddle,<WH2420> and speak<WH4911> a parable<WH4912> unto<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478>

And say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> A great<WH1419> eagle<WH5404> with great<WH1419> wings,<WH3671> long-winged,<WH750> <WH83> full<WH4392> of feathers,<WH5133> which<WH834> had divers colors,<WH7553> came<WH935> unto<WH413> Lebanon,<WH3844> and took<WH3947> <WH853> the highest branch<WH6788> of the cedar: <WH730>

He cropped off<WH6998> <WH853> the top<WH7218> of his young twigs,<WH3242> and carried<WH935> it into<WH413> a land<WH776> of traffic;<WH3667> he set<WH7760> it in a city<WH5892> of merchants.<WH7402>

He took<WH3947> also of the seed<WH4480> <WH2233> of the land,<WH776> and planted<WH5414> it in a fruitful<WH2233> field;<WH7704> he placed<WH3947> it by<WH5921> great<WH7227> waters,<WH4325> and set<WH7760> it as a willow tree.<WH6851>

And it grew,<WH6779> and became<WH1961> a spreading<WH5628> vine<WH1612> of low<WH8217> stature,<WH6967> whose branches<WH1808> turned<WH6437> toward<WH413> him, and the roots<WH8328> thereof were<WH1961> under<WH8478> him: so it became<WH1961> a vine,<WH1612> and brought forth<WH6213> branches,<WH905> and shot forth<WH7971> sprigs.<WH6288>

There was<WH1961> also another<WH259> great<WH1419> eagle<WH5404> with great<WH1419> wings<WH3671> and many<WH7227> feathers:<WH5133> and, behold,<WH2009> this<WH2063> vine<WH1612> did bend<WH3719> her roots<WH8328> toward him, and shot forth<WH7971> her branches<WH1808> toward<WH5921> him, that he might water<WH8248> it by the furrows<WH4480> <WH6170> of her plantation.<WH4302>

It <WH1931> was planted<WH8362> in<WH413> a good<WH2896> soil<WH7704> by<WH413> great<WH7227> waters,<WH4325> that it might bring forth<WH6213> branches,<WH6057> and that it might bear<WH5375> fruit,<WH6529> that it might be<WH1961> a goodly<WH155> vine.<WH1612>

Say <WH559> thou, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Shall it prosper?<WH6743> shall he not<WH3808> pull up<WH5423> <WH853> the roots<WH8328> thereof, and cut off<WH7082> the fruit<WH6529> thereof, that it wither?<WH3001> it shall wither<WH3001> in all<WH3605> the leaves<WH2965> of her spring,<WH6780> even without<WH3808> great<WH1419> power<WH2220> or many<WH7227> people<WH5971> to pluck it up<WH5375> <WH853> by the roots<WH4480> <WH8328> thereof.

Yea, behold,<WH2009> being planted,<WH8362> shall it prosper?<WH6743> shall it not<WH3808> utterly wither,<WH3001> <WH3001> when the east<WH6921> wind<WH7307> toucheth<WH5060> it? it shall wither<WH3001> in<WH5921> the furrows<WH6170> where it grew.<WH6780>
Moreover the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Say <WH559> now<WH4994> to the rebellious<WH4805> house,<WH1004> Know<WH3045> ye not<WH3808> what<WH4100> these<WH428> things mean? tell<WH559> them, Behold,<WH2009> the king<WH4428> of Babylon<WH894> is come<WH935> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> and hath taken<WH3947> <WH853> the king<WH4428> thereof, and the princes<WH8269> thereof, and led<WH935> them with<WH413> him to Babylon;<WH894>

And hath taken<WH3947> of the king's<WH4410> seed,<WH4480> <WH2233> and made<WH3772> a covenant<WH1285> with<WH854> him, and hath taken<WH935> an oath<WH423> of him: he hath also taken<WH3947> the mighty<WH352> of the land: <WH776>
That the kingdom<WH4467> might be<WH1961> base,<WH8217> that it might not<WH1115> lift itself up,<WH5375> but that by keeping<WH8104> <WH853> of his covenant<WH1285> it might stand.<WH5975>

But he rebelled<WH4775> against him in sending<WH7971> his ambassadors<WH4397> into Egypt,<WH4714> that they might give<WH5414> him horses<WH5483> and much<WH7227> people.<WH5971> Shall he prosper?<WH6743> shall he escape<WH4422> that doeth<WH6213> such<WH428> things? or shall he break<WH6565> the covenant,<WH1285> and be delivered?<WH4422>

As I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> surely<WH518> <WH3808> in the place<WH4725> where the king<WH4428> dwelleth that made him king,<WH4427> <WH853> whose<WH834> <WH853> oath<WH423> he despised,<WH959> and whose<WH834> <WH853> covenant<WH1285> he broke,<WH6565> even with<WH854> him in the midst<WH8432> of Babylon<WH894> he shall die.<WH4191>

Neither <WH3808> shall Pharaoh<WH6547> with his mighty<WH1419> army<WH2428> and great<WH7227> company<WH6951> make<WH6213> for him in the war,<WH4421> by casting up<WH8210> mounts,<WH5550> and building<WH1129> forts,<WH1785> to cut off<WH3772> many<WH7227> persons: <WH5315>

Seeing he despised<WH959> the oath<WH423> by breaking<WH6565> the covenant,<WH1285> when, lo,<WH2009> he had given<WH5414> his hand,<WH3027> and hath done<WH6213> all<WH3605> these<WH428> things, he shall not<WH3808> escape.<WH4422>

Therefore <WH3651> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> As I<WH589> live,<WH2416> surely<WH518> <WH3808> mine oath<WH423> that<WH834> he hath despised,<WH959> and my covenant<WH1285> that<WH834> he hath broken,<WH6565> even it will I recompense<WH5414> upon his own head.<WH7218>

And I will spread<WH6566> my net<WH7568> upon<WH5921> him, and he shall be taken<WH8610> in my snare,<WH4686> and I will bring<WH935> him to Babylon,<WH894> and will plead<WH8199> with<WH854> him there<WH8033> for his trespass<WH4603> that<WH834> he hath trespassed<WH4603> against me.

And all<WH3605> his fugitives<WH4015> with all<WH3605> his bands<WH102> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> and they that remain<WH7604> shall be scattered<WH6566> toward all<WH3605> winds:<WH7307> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> it.

Thus <WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I<WH589> will also take<WH3947> of the highest branch<WH4480> <WH6788> of the high<WH7311> cedar,<WH730> and will set<WH5414> it; I will crop off<WH6998> from the top<WH4480> <WH7218> of his young twigs<WH3127> a tender one,<WH7390> and will plant<WH8362> it upon<WH5921> a high<WH1364> mountain<WH2022> and eminent: <WH8524>

In the mountain<WH2022> of the height<WH4791> of Israel<WH3478> will I plant<WH8362> it: and it shall bring forth<WH5375> boughs,<WH6057> and bear<WH6213> fruit,<WH6529> and be<WH1961> a goodly<WH117> cedar:<WH730> and under<WH8478> it shall dwell<WH7931> all<WH3605> fowl<WH6833> of every<WH3605> wing;<WH3671> in the shadow<WH6738> of the branches<WH1808> thereof shall they dwell.<WH7931>

And all<WH3605> the trees<WH6086> of the field<WH7704> shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have brought down<WH8213> the high<WH1364> tree,<WH6086> have exalted<WH1361> the low<WH8217> tree,<WH6086> have dried up<WH3001> the green<WH3892> tree,<WH6086> and have made the dry<WH3002> tree<WH6086> to flourish:<WH6524> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have spoken<WH1696> and have done<WH6213> it.
